articles.author: Aurora Almendral
articles.title: Hamas releases video of Israeli hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin - NBC News
articles.description: A video of Israeli American hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin was released Wednesday by Hamas' military wing, Al-Qassam Brigades.
articles.content:
A video of Israeli American hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin was released Wednesday by Hamas' military wing, Al-Qassam Brigades.
